Steps.Message: Update at 02:52- Just to let you know our staff have now arrived back on site in the Westgate Road, DA1 2 area. They are going to test our equipment thoroughly to check if the underlying issue can be located before they attempt to restore your power again. I know having power cuts this often must be causing you a lot of problems, and our staff are doing everything they can to keep the power on. Our timeframe remains unchanged, and we're keeping in contact with our staff regularly to make sure you have the best information to plan ahead. I'll update you as soon as we hear more from them.

We became aware of a power cut at 22:52. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 02:52- Just to let you know our staff have now arrived back on site in the Westgate Road, DA1 2 area. They are going to test our equipment thoroughly to check if the underlying issue can be located before they attempt to restore your power again. I know having power cuts this often must be causing you a lot of problems, and our staff are doing everything they can to keep the power on. Our timeframe remains unchanged, and we're keeping in contact with our staff regularly to make sure you have the best information to plan ahead. I'll update you as soon as we hear more from them.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
